forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 57F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 41F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High near 50F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 3C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 38F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 53F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 40F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 53F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. E winds shifting to SW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
